See the 14 * GNU General Public License for more details. 15 * 16 * You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License 17 * along with this program. If not, see <https://www.gnu.org/licenses/>. 18 * 19 * Author: Lucas Hernández Abreu 20 * Contact: lucas.hernandez.09@ull.edu.es 21 */ 22 32 #ifndef IMG_OUTPUTER_H 33 #define IMG_OUTPUTER_H 34 35 #include "../processing_unit_interface.h" 36 43 class ImgOutputer : public ProcessingUnitInterface { 44 public: 45 // Default Constructor 46 ImgOutputer(); 47 48 // Destructor 49 ~ImgOutputer(); 50 51 // Doesn't need to allocate nothing 52 void Start(void **pre_process_args) override; 53 54 // Gets the img and prints it into 2 files. 55 void Run(void *) override; 56 57 // Doesn't need to deallocate anything 58 void Delete() override; 59 60 // Returns a pointer to a clone of ImgOutputer 61 ProcessingUnitInterface *Clone() override; 62 63 private: 64 // Changes a value from Int to a Pixel value 65 pixel_value IntToPixel(int); 66 }; 67 68 #endif
